summary: Triggers the Attack-Release-part of a Synth ADSR

ports.name: Synth
ports.text: The synth to play a note on

ports.name: Trigger Arrack Release
ports.text: Triggers attack followed by release of the synth connected to the `Synth` input port

ports.name: Note
ports.text: Which note to play, e.g. `C4` (middle C). You can also put in a frequency, e.g. `440`. You can use the `Note` op to make this more convenient.

ports.name: Duration
ports.text: The time between the trigger of attack and release, so basically how long the tone is. You can use the op `ToneTime` to make this more convenient. Valid durations are e.g. `4n` (one quarter note), `1m` (one measure), `1.2` (1.2 seconds)

ports.name: Time
ports.text: When the note should be triggered, `+0` = now
